attributes.action: Enforce conscription for fellons/young offenders ie. people convicted of crimes other than murder/manslaughter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our prisions are overflowing, our armed forces are under manned, anybody who faces imprisonment for crimes committed should be conscripted for at least twice as long as their prison sentence.
Instead of sitting in prison cells watching television, learning from other inmates on how to become a better crook and becoming couch potatoes.
It would also make these people think twice before commiting social crimes, it would teach them respect, authority and personal pride. 
They would be forced to respect their country, learn a trade and become self sufficient without having to prey on their own kind.
This would also save the country funding more prisons.
It would build up our armed forces.
It would clear our streets of scum.
It would reduce our prison population.
Above all it would give these people pride in themselves and make them useful members of society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
